author: bodewig
msg: Help getting the wrapper scripts that ship with Ant's "normal"
distributions and the RPMs closer to each other by (1) allowing a
system wide configuration file in /etc and (2) using some environment
variables to enable RPM specific behavior.

author: bodewig
msg: Make sure dest file is only created if URL can be opened
and make sure the output file gets closed in case of an error, while

author: ehatcher
msg: DynamicConfigurator - allows tasks themselves to handle unknown elements and attributes rather than being constrained by the IntrospectionHelper rules.

msg: task to create a temporary filename in a property; docs and tests to follow
